camera_gear.shutter_speed: Slow shutter speed (approx 1/30s) to capture slight motion blur in vehicles

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Dusk / Blue Hour transitioning to night (Civil Twilight)
lighting_setup.weather: Clear sky with strong twilight gradient (magenta/pink horizon to deep blue overhead)
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Mixed lighting: Backlighting from the twilight sky, frontal/side lighting from street sources
lighting_setup.quality: Soft ambient skylight contrasting with hard, punctual artificial light sources
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Warm glowing streetlights (sodium vapor effect),  Interior office illumination (3000K-4000K mixed)

color_grading.palette: Cinematic Teal and Orange complementary scheme. Warm tones (orange/amber) in the street level lights. Cool tones (deep blue/magenta/purple) in the upper sky and shadows.
color_grading.saturation: Rich and saturated, particularly in the warm streetlights
color_grading.contrast: High contrast with deep shadows and bright, specular highlights

texture_quality.details: Reflective wet asphalt reflecting lights and neon,tactile pavement textures，windows with reflection and diffuse light transmission dual effect
Ray-traced reflections on glass, physically based rendering (PBR) material fidelity, sharp architectural edges，real indoor scenes of buildings

atmosphere.feeling: The vibrant transition of a megacity from day to night

technical_quality.post_processing: Cinematic color grading with split-toning, increased clarity and local contrast, slight bloom effect around bright light sources
technical_quality.white_balance: Mixed WB, leaning towards tungsten (warm) for the foreground and street lights, allowing the sky to go naturally cool/magenta
technical_quality.tone: Dark and moody with crushed blacks in the periphery and bright highlights in the center
technical_quality.vignette: Strong optical vignette to darken corners and focus attention on the central street scene and the main building
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range (HDR) look, preserving details in both the bright car lights and the dark building facades
